古くさい: (ふるくさい) - stale; old fashioned; hackneyed; trite
古く見せる: (ふるくみせる) - to impart an ancient appearance
古びる: (ふるびる) - to look old; to get old
古び衰える: (ふるびおとろえる) - to waste away
古ぼける: (ふるぼける) - to look old; to become musty; to wear out
古事来歴: (こじらいれき) - (yoji) origin and history; particulars
古事記: (ふることふみ) - Records of Ancient Matters (Japan's oldest historical record)
古事記伝: (こじきでん) - Commentary on the Kojiki (by Motoori Norinaga, 1798)
古人骨: (こじんこつ) - ancient human skeleton; archaeological human remains
古今: (こきん) - ancient and modern times; all ages; past and present
古今東西: (ここんとうざい) - (yoji) all times and places; all ages and countries
古今無双: (ここんむそう) - (yoji) unparalleled in history
古今独歩: (ここんどっぽ) - (yoji) unsurpassed in history
古今集: (こきんしゅう) - (abbr. of 古今和歌集) Collection of Poems of Ancient and Modern Times
古代エジプト語: (こだいエジプトご) - Ancient Egyptian (language)
古代オリンピック: (こだいオリンピック) - ancient Olympics
古代中国: (こだいちゅうごく) - ancient China
古代人: (こだいじん) - the ancients; ancient people
古代文明: (こだいぶんめい) - ancient civilization; ancient civilisation
古代米: (こだいまい) - ancient rice varieties; wild rice
古備前: (こびぜん) - Bizen sword (mid-Heian to early Kamakura periods); ancient Bizen ware (Kamakura to early Momoyama periods)
古傷: (ふるきず) - old wound; scar; old unpleasant incident
古兵: (こへい) - (こぶし only) feudal warrior/samurai; old soldier/veteran/old hand
古典学者: (こてんがくしゃ) - classicist; classical scholar
古典時代: (こてんじだい) - the classical period
古典楽器: (こてんがっき) - Japanese classical musical instruments
古典物理学: (こてんぶつりがく) - classical physics
古典的条件づけ: (こてんてきじょうけんづけ) - classical conditioning
古典的条件付け: (こてんてきじょうけんづけ) - classical conditioning
古典芸能: (こてんげいのう) - classical theatre; classical theater
古典語: (こてんご) - classical or dead languages
古典論理学: (こてんろんりがく) - classical logic
古典量子論: (こてんりょうしろん) - classical quantum theory
古切れ: (ふるぎれ) - old cloth; old rags
古創: (ふるきず) - old wound; scar; old unpleasant incident
古医方: (こいほう) - Edo-period school of Chinese medicine based on pre-Jin and Yuan teachings
古器: (こき) - antique vessel; antique utensil; antique
古城: (こじょう) - old castle; old fortress
古墳時代: (こふんじだい) - Kofun period (of Japanese history, 250-538 CE); Tumulus period
